original_text: and threw him into the pit, and shut it and sealed it over him, so that he might not deceive the nations any longer, until the thousand years were ended. After that he must be released for a little while.
korean_text: 무저갱에 던져 넣어 잠그고 그 위에 인봉하여 천 년이 차도록 다시는 만국을 미혹하지 못하게 하였는데 그 후에는 반드시 잠깐 놓이리라

sentences.original_text: and threw him into the pit
so that he might not deceive the nations any longer
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 더 이상 민족들을 미혹하지 못하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: until the thousand years were ended
sentences.korean_translation: 그 기간은 천 년이 차도록 하였고

sentences.original_text: he must be released for a little while
